title: Leftklick has problems
body:
Hi all :) 
since 4 games my game does not work correctly 
i cant klick on the shop when i leftklick it - i have to klick "P"
i cant use smart pings - when i press "G" the mouse changes but i cant activate the ping with left klick 
and when i want to place a pink ward i cant place it with left mouse too - i have to press "6" or on which number i have it 

my left mouse key works so thats not the problem 
can anyone help me ? :) 
ty
